attributes.action: Stop the Tichenham Inn pub from closing.
attributes.background: Our local pub has been there since I moved to Ickenham, it is a staple of our community and more than just a pub. I will do whatever I can to stop it from closing especially as it isn’t necessary.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about pubs closing are a matter for individual pub owners, not the UK Government or Parliament.
